Title: Testy Mc. Testface
Body Text: Unique. <NEWLINE> You may recruit this unit in the holding phase. <RECRUIT_ACTION> <4W> <EXHAUST> <END_COST> Draw a card. <RANGED_ACTION> <COMBAT> <2D> <EXHAUST> <END_COST> Deal 2 damage to target unit. Then do some extra targeting to make this line wrap. <BREAK_ACTION> <3D> <EXHAUST> <END_COST> Deal 3 damage to target unit.
